description: After experiencing life without tourism, some want to change the way the Balearic islands work.
title: Coronavirus: Spain's holiday islands shake off party image
title_page: Coronavirus: Spain's holiday islands shake off party image - BBC News
maintext: For Antoni Pallicer Mateu, a member of publishing collective Tot Incl¨°s that aim to inform on tourism's impact on the islands, Balearic citizens and in particular Majorcans have become prisoners to a sector "that is so vulnerable to instability" and whose use of resources is such that almost all other needs have to be imported.
